alert.note: Alert for Central Colorado River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 2:10AM MST until January 18 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow expected. Additional accumulations of 2-4 inches along the I-70 corridor between New Castle and Dotsero, including Glenwood Canyon. Additional accumulations of a trace to 2 inches east of Dotsero and south of Glenwood Springs along Highway 82. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Central Colorado River Basin. * WHEN...Through 5 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially in open areas. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
